  • Method Details

    • clear

      public void clear() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      this function clears the local and database list of users for testing purposes.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - the function might fail to access the database.

    • Insert

      public void Insert(UserMod myUserMod) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      this function is used to add new users.
      Parameters:
      myUserMod - the user to be added.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - when insert fails to add myUserMod.

    • remove

      public void remove(UserMod myUserMod)
      deletes a specified user from the database
      Parameters:
      myUserMod - the user to be deleted.

    • findUser

    • findAllUser

      public Collection<UserMod> findAllUser() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      returns a Collection of User's to be worked with for testing.
      Returns:
      a collection of the users in the database.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException
